  • Gtk::Combo * m_mapEditEDInsertTypeCombo
    Combo-box with the possible values of extra data insert type.
  • Gtk::Entry * m_mapEditEDGroup
    An entry-box where to write the group of the extra data record, if it should be part of any.
  • Gtk::Entry * m_mapEditRefID
    An entry-box where to write a reference ID for the change.
  • Gtk::Entry * m_mapEditEmpty
    An empty entry-box (to make the logboxes symmetric).

Detailed Description

This box contains labels and fields where to write e.g.

the source and comment when making a change to a map. Here is also a method to get this information (including time, username etc.) in a format understod by ExtraDataReader.

Member Function Documentation

vector<MC2String> MELogCommentInterfaceBox::getLogComments (  const char *  origValStr = ""  ) 
 

Get all information for the extra data comment record.

It collects information from the edit-boxes in this class and, if provided, original value. The format is understod as a comment by the ExtraDataReader.

Parameters:
origValStr A string containing the original value of the change to be written in the logString. Default is an empty string.
Returns:
A vector with all sub strings that is the extra data comment record.
